title: Halden's Master Plan Revealed
story_summary: In the heart of Stenograd, where a powerful algorithm called the Behavioral Compliance Index quietly ruled every life, unrest simmered beneath the city's smooth, machine-driven order. When the system's elusive architect, Marek Halden, was found dead in his sealed home, the backbone of governance began to falter, sparking a swelling movement among those branded noncompliant. Empowered citizens boldly declared themselves 'scoreless,' abandoning BCI-controlled services to build vibrant parallel communities and self-governed districts, while authorities scrambled to crush the rebellion but only stoked further defiance - even as officials themselves began to defect. Amid this upheaval, reformers Oksana and Rada uncovered Halden's hidden truth: he had sabotaged his own system, exposing its flaws so Stenograd could reclaim its future. As his confession swept the city, residents rose to demand transparency, forcing the old Council to resign. Together, they dismantled the BCI, erased its ranks and scores, and replaced it all with open assemblies, forging a new era of collective, participatory rule born from one man's final, calculated sacrifice.

official.headline: City Debates Future
official.anchor_line: Citizens gather for open citywide forums, supporting public dialogue and collective review.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd's commitment to transparent discussion ensures continued unity and orderly transition.

official.headline: Council Steps Down
official.anchor_line: The Council announces its resignation, prioritizing the city's stability and fresh perspective.
official.contextual_reframing: Leadership transition reflects the adaptive strength of Stenograd's governance systems.

official.headline: Era Concludes
official.anchor_line: As the BCI era ends, citizens prepare for open governance by collective agreement.
official.contextual_reframing: By embracing full transparency and shared responsibility, Stenograd enters a new chapter of progress.

underground.headline: BCI Exposed Live
underground.anchor_line: Halden's hidden confession and logs released citywide - turns out the system was built to break us all along.
underground.contextual_reframing: Years of obey, comply, adjust - and for what? Even the system's creator knew the truth couldn't stay buried forever.

underground.headline: Council Walks Out
underground.anchor_line: Under pressure from angry crowds, the last Council members finally bail - no more control panels, no more quiet threats.
underground.contextual_reframing: Authoritarian order unravels fast when the people see how deep the lies really go. This is what collapse looks like up close.

underground.headline: A New Dawn - Or Not
underground.anchor_line: Scoreless streets, vanished controls, public debate on every corner - this is the end of hidden rule in Stenograd.
underground.contextual_reframing: Can we build something for ourselves at last? The city's watching. This chapter is ours to write or erase.
